DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter trial comparing laparoscopic correction of a perforated peptic ulcer with the open technique by upper laparotomy. Hypothesis is that after laparoscopic correction will be discharged 3 days sooner due to less postoperative pain and complications.
DOC.brief_title: The LAMA Trial: Laparoscopic Correction of Perforated Peptic Ulcer Versus Open Correction
DOC.criteria: All patients clinical suspected for perforated peptic ulcer Pregnancy Younger than 18 years Unable to sign consent form
